snippet.title: Robot Wars: Arenas of Destruction - Official UK PlayStation 2 Magazine Trailer
snippet.description:
This was the trailer as seen on the Official UK PlayStation 2 Magazine demo disc from 2001. (Specifically the issue which had demos of Klonoa 2, Time Crisis 2 and Rayman M)

Robot Wars: Arenas of Destruction (C) BBC Interactive
